message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to your endeavors. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000.  What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While that price doesn't quite reflect the value I believe this product holds, I'm open to finding a middle ground. Would you be willing to consider $1,100,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $950,000?
